main event: Observers reported seeing a very bright light over trees while parked on a back road near Canton, Ohio in July 1957.
interesting points: The sighting occurred approximately 8 miles southwest of Canton,The light was described as round and larger than a star,The light flashed intermittently, Observers felt the object was moving towards them but it did not change position significantly, The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes from 10:00 P.M. to 10:30 P.M.
